response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value for both of us. After careful consideration and evaluation, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am offering you the chance to purchase this exceptional item at a special price of $900,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects the unique opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discount. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer, so we can discuss further details and finalize the transaction.", "product_price": 900000}
